message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $1000000. I believe it's a great value and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $1000000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand your position. While I'm willing to negotiate,  $750000 is still below my minimum.  How about we meet in the middle at $875000? This price reflects the value of the product and gives us both a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $875000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $800000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $800000?
